techmeme.title: Armenian startup EasyDMARC, which uses the DMARC standard to simplify email security and authentication, raised a $20M Series A led by Radian Capital (Mike Butcher/TechCrunch)
Google plans to use C2PA's standard to identify images taken with a camera, edited in tools like Photoshop, or made using AI via its "about this image" feature (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Denver-based Hotel Engine, a hotel booking and management service, now called Engine, raised a $140M Series C at a $2.1B valuation, up from $1.3B in late 2021 (Allie Garfinkle/Fortune)
Microsoft calls for "clarity and consistency" over US export controls that have held up shipping AI chips to UAE-based G42, in which Microsoft invested $1.5B (Financial Times)
Apple Watch Series 10 review: bigger display, wide-angle OLED, faster charging, and sleep apnea detection, but no blood oxygen and another year of minor updates (Victoria Song/The Verge)
